Game.Name: YuYu Hakusho - Sunset Fighters (Brazil)
Game.plot: Yuu Yuu Hakusho: Makyou Toitsusen (幽☆遊☆白書 魔強統一戦) is a 1994 fighting game for the Sega Mega Drive by Treasure made with the Yuu Yuu Hakusho license — the second such game, after Nextech's adventure game Yuu Yuu Hakusho Gaiden. Interestingly, TecToy published the game in Brazil as Yuu Yuu Hakusho: Sunset Fighters, however the game has not been released elsewhere. M.I.J.E.T. fan-translated the game to English in 2007.The game is a 4-player fighting game. A and B attack and C blocks, with various combos along the way. Up jumps.
